name: Special City Truck Parking 3D
description: Special City Truck Parking 3D is the best city road truck parking contest which needs your full attention. You will never see such an amazing and challenging exciting round.Truck Parking is made for those who love to play hard driving and tough parking simulation. You act as a driver of a hotel and set the truck of your guests without damaging the truck. Get ready for most marvelous sporty truck, sit behind the wheels. Make your precision good and land in your unique at right spot. Place your heavy truck on the right location and increase your parking skills.
